mapper.select: SELECT order_id, rate, feedback, feedback_time, renter_id, employee_id, job_id, status_id, payment_id FROM orders ORDER BY feedback_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (location, longitude, latitude, work_date, work_time, order_date, renter_id, employee_id, job_id, status_id, voucher_code) VALUES (#{location}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{workDate}, #{workTime}, #{orderDate}, #{renterId}, #{employeeId}, #{jobId}, #{statusId}, #{voucherCode});
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, work_date, work_time, work_start, work_end, rate, feedback, feedback_time, renter_id, employee_id, job_id, status_id, payment_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY feedback_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status_id = #{statusId}, work_start = #{order.workStart}, work_end = #{order.workEnd} WHERE order_id = #{order.orderId}
